item.title: 2018 DoE Annual Scholarship
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, Central Tibetan Administration is pleased to announce 530 scholarships for the year 2018. All interested students must submit your scholarship application online along with form A and other necessary documents on or before June 15, 2018 (Bachelors) & August 31, 2018 (Masters), except an application of Special Scholarship for Master in...

item.title: 2017 Sikyong Professional Sholarship Announcement
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, CTA & the Tibet Fund are pleased to announce 8 Bachelor’s degree and 12 Post Graduate (Master’s Program) professional course/program. This scholarship is offered to encourage Tibetan students to apply to more competitive professional degree programs at selective professional schools in India.
